function.name: research.github_repos
function.description: Finds multiple GitHub repositories, saves them to the blackboard, and initiates the processing plan. Use this to start any multi-repo analysis.

query.description: The search query for repositories, e.g., 'LLM agent framework'.

num_results.description: Number of results to find. Defaults to 3.

function.name: research.web_summarize
function.description: Finds multiple web pages, saves them, and kicks off a plan to summarize them. Use this to compare items from across the web.

query.description: The web search query, e.g., 'best wireless headphones 2024'.

num_results.description: Number of web pages to analyze. Defaults to 3.
